elements.name: q1
elements.title: Did a parent or adult in your household often swear at, insult, put down, or humiliate you? Or act in a way that made you fear physical harm?

elements.name: q2
elements.title: Did a parent or adult in your household often push, grab, slap, or throw objects at you? Or ever hit you hard enough to cause injury?

elements.name: q3
elements.title: Did anyone at least 5 years older than you ever touch you sexually or force sexual contact?

elements.name: q4
elements.title: Did you often feel unsupported, unloved, or that family members didn't care for each other?

elements.name: q5
elements.title: Did you often lack adequate food, clean clothing, or protection due to parental neglect?

elements.name: q6
elements.title: Were your biological parents ever separated or divorced?

elements.name: q7
elements.title: Was your mother (or stepmother) ever physically abused by a partner? This includes pushing, slapping, or threats with weapons.

elements.name: q8
elements.title: Did you live with anyone who abused alcohol or used illegal drugs?

elements.name: q9
elements.title: Did you live with anyone who was depressed, mentally ill, or attempted suicide?

elements.name: q10
elements.title: Did a household member ever go to prison?
